description:
Amae Masao has his mother make him a bento every day, but he was actually switching that bento with his girlfriend in secret. He and his girlfriend end up getting in a fight over the bentos, and he seeks help from Moguro, but...
 
Part B
Kamera Tetsuya’s work life and hobbies aren’t going very well lately, so Moguro pulls some strings and allows him to ride the 583-Type that he had so many fond memories on. Kamera is moved by the gesture, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bentou Sensou / Aa, Itoshi no 583 Kei
La guerre des bentos – Ah, 583 adoré
弁当戦争 / ああ, 愛しの583系
